betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The New Crimson Revelations mod brings back the six mystical arrows from TC4!

Here are their functions:

Aer Arrow: Deals damage that can pierce through any armor.
Ignis Arrow: Ignites the target upon impact.
Aqua Arrow: Slows the movement speed of the target.
Terra Arrow: Deals higher damage.
Ordo Arrow: Provides a small amount of armor penetration and inflicts the Weakness debuff on the target.
Perditio Arrow: Deals reduced damage but inflicts the Withering effect on the target.
